headline.main: Bahrain Advances Military Trials for Suspected Militants
headline.print_headline: Bahrain Advances Military Trials for Suspected Militants

lead_paragraph: Bahrain's top government advisory body passed a constitutional amendment allowing suspected militants to be tried in military courts on Sunday, state news agency BNA reported, in a move criticized by activists.
snippet: Bahrain's top government advisory body passed a constitutional amendment allowing suspected militants to be tried in military courts on Sunday, state news agency BNA reported, in a move criticized by activists....
